channel.title: Editng 508 client?
channel.description: i jus want to know how i edit the language of a 508 client it's open source and all like i changed the picture and all i just want to know how to change tha language it's in malay atm.. i don't know that i want it to be english can someone please tell me how?

item.title: Editng 508 client?
item.dc:creator: @Pheega Pheega
item.description:
@Pheega wrote:

[quote=“shepard19, post:1, topic:282289”]i jus want to know how i edit the language of a 508 client it’s open source and all like i changed the picture and all i just want to know how to change tha language it’s in malay atm… i don’t know that i want it to be english can someone please tell me how?[/quote]Look in your run.bat file (or whatever runs the client), change the language argument to “english”.

Read full topic
